Function Documentation

DIRTYCODE_API void NetCritEnter ( NetCritT *  pCrit)

Enter a critical section, blocking if needed. If implemented under a non-threaded O/S, then there should never be a reason for this routine to want to block.

Parameters
*pCrit- critical section marker
Version
11/15/1999 (gschaefer)

References NetCritPrivT::access, NetCritPrivT::csect, NetCritPrivT::locked, NetCritTry(), and NetCritPrivT::thread.

Referenced by CommUDPCallback(), CommUDPSend(), DirtyCertCAPreloadCerts(), DirtyCertCARequestCert(), DirtyCertCARequestDone(), DirtyCertCARequestFree(), DirtyCertControl(), DirtyCertStatus(), NetGameLinkRecv2(), NetGameLinkSend(), NetIdleDone(), ProtoAdvtAnnounce(), ProtoAdvtCancel(), ProtoAdvtConstruct(), ProtoAdvtDestroy(), ProtoHttpAbort(), ProtoHttpRecv(), ProtoHttpSend(), ProtoHttpUpdate(), ProtoPingResponse(), ProtoSSLRecv(), ProtoSSLSend(), ProtoSSLUpdate(), ProtoTunnelAlloc(), ProtoTunnelControl(), ProtoTunnelFree2(), ProtoTunnelStatus(), ProtoTunnelUpdate(), ProtoTunnelUpdatePortList(), ProtoUdpRecvFrom(), QosApiCancelRequest(), QosApiControl(), QosApiDestroy(), QosApiServiceRequest(), QosApiStatus(), SocketBind(), SocketControl(), SocketHostnameAddRef(), SocketHostnameCacheAdd(), SocketHostnameCacheDel(), SocketHostnameCacheGet(), SocketImport(), SocketInfo(), SocketRecvfrom(), VoipActivateLocalUser(), VoipCommonControl(), VoipConnect(), VoipConnectionAddSessionId(), VoipConnectionDeleteSessionId(), VoipConnectionStart(), VoipConnectionUpdate(), VoipControl(), VoipDisconnect2(), VoipGroupMuteByConnId2(), VoipHeadsetControl(), VoipRemove(), VoipSetLocalUser(), WebLogPrintf(), and WebLogUpdate().

const char *  pCritName 
)

Parameters

*pCritName- unused

DIRTYCODE_API void NetCritLeave ( NetCritT *  pCrit)

Leave a critical section. Must be called once for every NetCritEnter (or successful NetCritTry).

Parameters
*pCrit- critical section marker
Version
11/15/1999 (gschaefer)

References NetCritPrivT::access, NetCritPrivT::csect, NetCritPrivT::locked, and NetCritPrivT::thread.

Referenced by CommUDPCallback(), CommUDPSend(), DirtyCertCAPreloadCerts(), DirtyCertCARequestCert(), DirtyCertCARequestDone(), DirtyCertCARequestFree(), DirtyCertControl(), DirtyCertStatus(), NetGameLinkRecv2(), NetGameLinkSend(), NetIdleCall(), NetIdleDone(), ProtoAdvtAnnounce(), ProtoAdvtCancel(), ProtoAdvtConstruct(), ProtoAdvtDestroy(), ProtoHttpAbort(), ProtoHttpRecv(), ProtoHttpSend(), ProtoHttpUpdate(), ProtoPingResponse(), ProtoSSLRecv(), ProtoSSLSend(), ProtoSSLUpdate(), ProtoTunnelAlloc(), ProtoTunnelControl(), ProtoTunnelFree2(), ProtoTunnelStatus(), ProtoTunnelUpdate(), ProtoTunnelUpdatePortList(), ProtoUdpRecvFrom(), ProtoUdpUpdate(), QosApiCancelRequest(), QosApiControl(), QosApiDestroy(), QosApiServiceRequest(), QosApiStatus(), SocketBind(), SocketControl(), SocketHostnameAddRef(), SocketHostnameCacheAdd(), SocketHostnameCacheDel(), SocketHostnameCacheGet(), SocketImport(), SocketInfo(), SocketRecvfrom(), VoipActivateLocalUser(), VoipCommonControl(), VoipConnect(), VoipConnectionAddSessionId(), VoipConnectionDeleteSessionId(), VoipConnectionStart(), VoipConnectionUpdate(), VoipControl(), VoipDisconnect2(), VoipGroupMuteByConnId2(), VoipHeadsetControl(), VoipRemove(), VoipSetLocalUser(), WebLogPrintf(), and WebLogUpdate().

DIRTYCODE_API int32_t NetCritTry ( NetCritT *  pCrit)

Attempt to gain access to critical section. Always returns immediately regadless of access status. A thread that already has access to a critical section can always receive repeated access to it.

Parameters
*pCrit- critical section marker
Returns
int32_t - zero=unable to get access, non-zero=access granted
Version
11/15/1999 (gschaefer)

References NetCritPrivT::access, NetCritPrivT::csect, NetCritPrivT::locked, and NetCritPrivT::thread.

Referenced by NetCritEnter(), NetIdleCall(), and ProtoUdpUpdate().

DIRTYCODE_API int32_t NetHash ( const char *  pString)

Calculate a unique 32-bit hash based on the given input string.

Parameters
*pString- pointer to string to calc hash of
Returns
int32_t - resultant 32bit hash
Version
2.0 07/26/2011 (jrainy) rewrite to lower collision rate

References NetHashBin().

DIRTYCODE_API uint32_t NetRand ( uint32_t  uLimit)

A simple pseudo-random sequence generator. The sequence is implicitly seeded in the first call with the millisecond tick count at the time of the call.

Parameters
uLimit- upper bound of pseudo-random number output
Returns
uint32_t - pseudo-random number from [0...(uLimit - 1)]
Version
06/25/2009 (jbrookes)

References NetTick().

Referenced by SocketPacketQueueRem().

DIRTYCODE_API uint32_t NetTick ( void  )

Return some kind of increasing tick count with millisecond scale (does not need to have millisecond precision, but higher precision is better).

Returns
uint32_t - millisecond tick count
Version
09/15/1999 (gschaefer)

Referenced by CommSRPTick(), CommTCPSend(), CommTCPTick(), CommUDPDestroy(), CommUDPSend(), CommUDPTick(), CommUDPUnconnect(), CommUDPUnlisten(), HttpManagerCreate(), HttpManagerRecv(), HttpManagerUpdate(), NetConnElapsed(), NetConnIdle(), NetGameDistCreate(), NetGameDistInputCheck(), NetGameDistInputClear(), NetGameDistInputLocalMulti(), NetGameDistInputQueryMulti(), NetGameDistServStartGame(), NetGameDistServStatus(), NetGameDistServUpdate(), NetGameLinkCreate(), NetGameLinkRecv2(), NetGameLinkSend(), NetGameLinkStatus(), NetRand(), PingManagerCreate(), PingManagerUpdate(), ProtoAdvtAnnounce(), ProtoHttpServUpdate(), ProtoHttpUpdate(), ProtoMangleCreate(), ProtoPingResponse(), ProtoStreamControl(), ProtoStreamUpdate(), ProtoTunnelAlloc(), ProtoTunnelControl(), ProtoTunnelCreate(), ProtoTunnelFree2(), ProtoTunnelUpdate(), ProtoUpnpUpdate(), ProtoWebSocketConnect(), ProtoWebSocketUpdate(), SocketAddrMapInit(), SocketHostnameCacheAdd(), SocketHostnameCacheGet(), SocketPacketQueueAdd(), SocketPacketQueueCreate(), SocketPacketQueueRem(), SocketRateUpdate(), VoipConnectionFlush(), VoipConnectionSend(), VoipConnectionStart(), VoipConnectionUpdate(), WebOfferHttp(), and WebOfferHttpComplete().
